# Bin 21

> A modern, privacy-focused pastebin service.

## URL

https://bin21.dev

## Description

Bin 21 is a fast, minimal pastebin for sharing code and text. It supports 150+ programming languages with syntax highlighting (powered by Shiki), GitHub Flavored Markdown rendering, and optional client-side AES-256-GCM encryption for private pastes. Pastes can have configurable expiration times and burn-after-reading functionality.

## Key Features

- Syntax highlighting for 150+ languages (same engine as VS Code)
- Markdown rendering with GFM, math (KaTeX), and code highlighting
- Client-side AES-256-GCM encryption (password never leaves the browser)
- Configurable expiration (10 minutes, 1 hour, 1 day, 1 week, 1 month, or never)
- Burn after reading (auto-delete after viewed)
- Raw paste content access
- Dark mode optimized UI

## API

### Create a Paste

Pastes are created via the web interface at https://bin21.dev

### View a Paste

`GET https://bin21.dev/{paste-id}` — View a paste with syntax highlighting

### Raw Content

`GET https://bin21.dev/{paste-id}/raw` — Get raw paste content as plain text

## Tech Stack

- Next.js (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Shiki (syntax highlighting)
- PostgreSQL (metadata)
- Cloudflare R2 (content storage)
